title: RBI cancels licence of Varanasi-based Banaras Merchantile Co-op Bank
description: RBI cancels Banaras Merchantile Co-operative Bank's license citing financial instability. Depositors to receive up to Rs 5 lakh from DICGC. Bank lacks capital and earning prospects, leading to liquidation.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
